data.message: Eminem I am your biggest fan My future goes on just to be like you my name is zio from India and this is my bro's acc plzzzzzzzz send me feedback cus only ur songs are making me alive 24x7 I love u sooo much all other rapper is a crap i want to be like you I like you sooo much plzzzz contact me plzzzzzz plzzzzz Your my no 1 hero in this world i dnt gve a sht abt my gf and all i just gve a sht about u ur my God I praise you everyday i listen to your songs especially mockingbird and i dnt watch any other movies xcpt 8 miles u see i have proved myself dat m yo biggest fan i respect you so much God knws dat m really crazy about you plzzzzz Slim send me feedback plzzzz I trust In you Love you always my True singer

replies.message: Kill all the Muslims bomb their homes
